name: Little Postman In Forest
description:
Little Postman In Forest(LPIF) is a Casual Storytelling Platformer Game that deliver the importance of Postman, moral values and the lost art of Letter.

In LPIF, players can enjoy the story while having pressure-free puzzles and learn some moral values together with Pitu.

You will be playing as Pitu, an unknown creature to deliver a letter upon the request of the Big Wisdom Tree whereby you want to know your past since you lost your memories.

Be helpful, kind, and I wish you have fun playing LPIF and learning something.
